roleset.name: quote

example.name: with args 2 and 3
example.text: the announcer reads favorable quotes about the model from Motor Trend and Road & Track magazines
example.arg: from Motor Trend and Road & Track magazines

example.name: args 3 and 2
example.note: There could be an arg1 with this "price quotes of $12"-- which is why it's arg3.

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: a quote from Chairman David Boren "Don't hold your tickey until the show's over"
example.arg: "Don't hold your ticket until the show's over"

roleset.note: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to quote.01-v. VN class transfer_mesg-37.1.1-1. No FN class. Framed by Katie.
